data.text: Masuole han, Paul hah Athens renga Korinth a se zoia.

Mahan Juda inkhat a riming Aquila a mua, ha mi hah Pontus rama suok ania, Claudius Juda murdi Rom renga jôkpai rangin chong a pêk sikin a lômnu Priscilla le Italy ram renga hong inthon bil an ni. Paul an kôm a sea.
Ha ngei khom hah Paul anga puon in sin ngâi anni sikin an kôm a oma, munkhatin sin an tho zoi.
Sabbathni racham Synagog taka chong a mintukpui ngâia. Judangei le Greekngei hah min riet minthâr rang a bôk ngâia.
Silas le Timothy Macedonia ram renga an juong tungin chu Paul hah thurchi misîr injîen a zora a mang zoia, Jisua chu Messiah ani tiin Judangei kôm a ril minthâr ngâia.

Hannirese an doia an ril minsieta masuole, chu Paul'n a puona rababngei hah thikin chongnatakin a thuona, an kôm, “Nin thina chungroi chu nangnin pêl roi, keima chu ko jôk ani, atûn renga chu Jentailngei kôm se ki tih,” a tia.
Masikin a jôka Jentail inkhat a riming Titius Justus ina a lûta, ha mi hah Pathien biek ngâi mi ania, a in khom Synagog le ântôn chak.
Crispus Synagog ruoipu han a inmingei murdi le Pumapa an iema, Korinth khopuia mi tamtak khomin an rieta, an iema baptisma an chang zoi.
Jân khat chu Paul'n inlârna a mua, mahan Pumapa'n a kôm, “Chi no roh, dâirek loiin thurchi misîr tit roh,
asikchu nang ko ompui tit nang minna rangin tutên nu chunga an kut musum noni ngei, hi khopuia hin mi tamtak ko dôn kêng,” a tia.
Masik han, Paul hah ma khopuiliena han Pathien chong minchûn kum khat in-ang a oma.
Gallio ha Achaia rama râiôt a chang lâiin Judangei an inruola, Paul an sûra, roijêknamuna an tuonga.
“Hi mi hin balam niloia Pathien biek rangin mi methêm rang a bôk ngâi,” an tia.
Paul hong chong rang a ti lehan, Gallio han Judangei kôm, “Judangei, mahi neinun dikloi mini, aninônchu tho minchâina mini luo nirese chu, inkhêl loiin nangni mindon pe ki tih.
Hannirese, chongngei, rimingngei le nin balam chungroia inkhalna papai kêng ania, nangnin jêk roi. Kei chu ha anga neinunngei kai chu jêk no ning,” a tia.
Roijêkna mun renga a rujûlpai ngei zoia.
Anrêngin an Synagog ruoipu Sosthenes an sûra, roijêknamun mâia an jêma. Aniatachu Gallio han ma anga an tho ha itên rangâi pe ngei tet mak.

Masuole han Paul hah iempungei leh sûn tamtak a la oma, hanchu iempungei hah a mathân ngeia Syria ram tieng rukuongin a se zoia, a kôm Priscilla le Aquila khom an se sa. Paul'n chonginkhâm a lei dôn sikin Cenchreae a se mân a sam a ep baka.
Ephesus'a an tunga, mahan Priscilla le Aquila chu a mâka, ama chu Synagog taka a lûta Judangei hah chong a la mintukpui ngeia.
Anni han asôtzan om rangin an ngêna, hannirese pom pe ngei maka.
Manêkin, an kôm se khom inlang “Pathien lungdo anîn chu nin kôm la hong nôk ki tih,” tiin chong hoiin a mâk ngeia, Ephesus'a renga rukuongin a se zoia.
Caesarea a tungin chu Jerusalema a sea, koiindang chibai a mûka, masuole chu Antioch taka a se zoia.
Mahan sûn tamtak a om suo nûkin a se nôka, iempungei mindet tîrin Galatia ram le Phragia ram a sir suo zoi.
Ha lâia han Juda inkhat a riming Apollos, Alexandria taka suok Ephesus'a a juonga. Ama hah thurchi misîr theitak ania, Pathien Lekhabungei khom a riet oka.
Ama hah Pumapa lampui chong ânchu zoisai ania, mulungrîla satna tak inheiin Jisua thurchi a misîr ngâia, Nikhomrese, John baptisma vai kêng ala riet.
Synagog taka hâitakin thurchi misîr a phuta, hanchu Priscilla le Aquila hah a thurchi misîr an rietin chu an ina an tuonga, a kôm, Pathien lampui roi adik uolin an rilminthâr pea.

Hanchu ama hah Achaia rama se rang a bôk sikin Ephesus'a iempungeiin an mohôka ama an lei modômna rangin Achaia rama iempungei kôm lekha an miziek pea. A tungin chu Pathien moroina sika iempu hong chang ngei ta rangin a sanpu satak a changa.
Loko rieta Judangei hah a makhal mindoka, Pathien lekhabu mangin Jisua chu Messiah ani ti a minlang ngâi.
